NBA All Star Games

Source: R/bref.R
all_star_games.Rd

Returns scores from All-Star Games

all_star_games(include_aba = T, return_message = T)

Arguments

include_aba

if `TRUE` includes ABA scores
return_message

if `TRUE` returns a message

Value

a `tibble`

Examples

library(dplyr)
library(nbastatR)
df_asg <-
all_star_games()
df_asg %>% glimpse()
df_asg %>% count(namePlayerMVP, sort = T)
